name: Alejandro Ortiz Vargas
coverLetter: I am looking to stop messing around and do what I love I have no experience in trimming .. I know my strains waxes edibles etc... And I am highly motivated to step into the cannabis community.. I am willing to learn and really do something in the community.. If necessary I would probably need a ride and a place and some food and shower.. It would be highly appreciated.. I just want to get started.. I dont care where I have to start from.. -Alex
